channel.title: Shop and Dfs problem
channel.description: in my general store how can i make it so u can sell anyitems there My dfs is messed, i try going on dat maker and putting it on left hand and it didnt work, the dfs doesnt follow up with the left hand the shield.

sounds like your server sucks…

how about going into “itemhanlder.java”

then find this code…

public static int shields[] =

then add your dfs to that…

if that doesn’t work… i don’t know what else to tell you[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2009, 09:43:42 am[/size][hr]or… maybe it’s your “maker”

“makers” = lazy
[/quote]

and My dfs code is already item.java fool
What about the shop problem huh if ur so pro coder?[/quote]

item.title: Shop and Dfs problem
item.dc:creator: @Mager_scape Mager_scape
item.description:
@Mager_scape wrote:

there should be a file called “shops” Thats a class file. Click on it it says how do you wnat to see this? click on notepad and always shows this up. then there will be shop names. go to the shop you want to add items and type in the id of the item, then how many. like this: i want to add mind runes so i do this: 555 100: do you get it now?
